question: Which bollywood actress has been bestowed with the 2017 International Humanitarian Award at the Asian Voice Charity Awards?
explanation: Bollywood actress Jacqueline Fernandez has been bestowed with the International Humanitarian Award in Editor\'s Choice category at the 2017 annual Asian Voice Charity Awards for her work in India and worldwide. She has been working with the charity \'Habitat for Humanity for last five years. This organization works to help people to live with dignity by giving them homes to live in.
